featured.text: Peanuts is sad over the possibility of losing his grandfather.
Peanuts’ beloved grandfather has suffered a heart attack.
With the imaginative assistance of Dooley, Peanuts discovers the healing power of hope and love.

definition.zh_def: 花生，一種可食用的豆類植物，通常用於製作食物或油。
definition.en_def: A peanut is an edible legume that is often used in food or oil production.
definition.example: I love eating peanut butter on my toast.
